name: A story of An robot
description:
A game submited for Mini game jam, Created By GTA5AW.

Also, i'm kinda begginier at creating games, so keep that in mind

You meet a narrator, who tells you a story about a blue, red, and yellow robot. Game haves three endings.

Note:

I was too lazy to make in-game tutorial so, in order to beat the robot work section, you need to 

- click on the error stabilizer button to keep black bar away from button

- first click on the paint pool, and then with paint loaded, drag over paint bucket
